Jolly Green Giant Statue

Blue Earth, Minnesota Blue Earth, Minnesota

A 55.5-foot tall statue of the Jolly Green Giant, mascot of the Green Giant vegetable company.

About Minnesota Attractions

Welcome to our collection of roadside attractions in Minnesota. These unique destinations showcase the quirky and fascinating sites that make Minnesota road trips so memorable.

Use the interactive map above to explore these attractions by location. You can filter by category to find specific types of attractions. Click on a map marker or list item to learn more about each fascinating location.
